TextView.android:text: Studdy Buddy is an application that was created as part of a project for my Level 3 BTEC Diploma at South Devon College. This application aims to assist the user in creating reminders to better improve their work efficiency by alerting them of things such as deadlines/due dates, general things they need to do etc. This project is the result of around 6 months work creating the product that you are now using - there may be some bugs experienced every now and then but please understand, I am far from being an experienced Java developer. This is my first time fully experiencing Java and I have tried to make an application that is of the greatest quality that I am able to produce with little knowledge of the language.
